title: Serengeti Migration Safari
shortDescription: Witness the world's greatest wildlife spectacle as millions of wildebeest and zebra traverse the Serengeti plains in an epic journey of survival.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Arusha
itinerary.description: Meet and greet at Kilimanjaro Airport. Transfer to your accommodation in Arusha for briefing and overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Arusha to Serengeti National Park
itinerary.description: Depart Arusha and drive to Serengeti National Park via Ngorongoro Conservation Area. Begin your first game drive in Central Serengeti.

itinerary.title: Great Migration Experience
itinerary.description: Full day dedicated to following the Great Migration. Witness river crossings and predator-prey interactions.

itinerary.title: Hot Air Balloon Safari
itinerary.description: Early morning balloon safari over the Serengeti plains, followed by champagne breakfast. Afternoon game drive.

itinerary.title: Western Serengeti
itinerary.description: Explore the Western Corridor of Serengeti, known for its resident wildlife and dramatic river crossings.

itinerary.title: Ngorongoro Crater
itinerary.description: Descend into the world's largest intact volcanic caldera for a full day of game viewing among diverse wildlife.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Morning at leisure, then transfer to Kilimanjaro Airport for your departure flight.

inclusions: All park fees and government taxes
exclusions: Tips for guide and accommodation staff

title: Zanzibar Beach Paradise
shortDescription: Discover the enchanting spice island with pristine beaches, rich history, and vibrant culture in this tropical paradise escape.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Stone Town
itinerary.description: Arrival at Zanzibar Airport. Transfer to Stone Town for guided tour of the UNESCO World Heritage site.

itinerary.title: Spice Tour & Jozani Forest
itinerary.description: Morning spice tour to learn about Zanzibar's spice heritage. Afternoon visit to Jozani Forest to see red colobus monkeys.

itinerary.title: Beach Relaxation
itinerary.description: Transfer to beach resort. Enjoy pristine white sand beaches and crystal-clear waters of the Indian Ocean.

itinerary.title: Dolphin Tour & Snorkeling
itinerary.description: Early morning dolphin watching tour followed by snorkeling at Mnemba Atoll's coral reefs.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Morning at leisure on the beach. Transfer to airport for departure.

title: Kilimanjaro Trekking
shortDescription: Conquer Africa's highest peak via the scenic Machame Route with expert guides ensuring your safety and summit success.

itinerary.title: Machame Gate to Machame Camp
itinerary.description: Begin trek through the montane forest. First acclimatization day reaching Machame Camp at 3,000m.

itinerary.title: Machame Camp to Shira Camp
itinerary.description: Trek through moorland zone with spectacular views. Reach Shira Camp at 3,840m.

itinerary.title: Shira Camp to Barranco Camp
itinerary.description: Hike to Lava Tower (4,630m) for acclimatization, then descend to Barranco Camp at 3,960m.

itinerary.title: Barranco Camp to Karanga Camp
itinerary.description: Climb the famous Barranco Wall and continue to Karanga Camp for final acclimatization.

itinerary.title: Karanga Camp to Barafu Camp
itinerary.description: Short trek to Barafu Camp (4,640m), the base camp for summit attempt. Rest and prepare for summit night.

itinerary.title: Summit Day - Uhuru Peak
itinerary.description: Midnight start for summit attempt. Reach Uhuru Peak (5,895m) at sunrise, then descend to Mweka Camp.

itinerary.title: Mweka Camp to Mweka Gate
itinerary.description: Final descent through montane forest to Mweka Gate. Collect summit certificates and transfer to hotel.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Rest day in Moshi or transfer to airport for departure.

inclusions: Camping equipment and meals on mountain
Hotel accommodation before and after trek
Emergency oxygen and first aid kit
